statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({8.02}+{8.51}\right)}={33.06}\approx{33.06}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{8.51}\cdot{6.57}={55.9107}\approx{55.9}.
